alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 8:28PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Limestone County through 930 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Athens. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy downpours reducing visibility, and producing rainfall of 1 to 2 inches in less than one hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Excessive ponding of water and minor street flooding is likely. Locations impacted include... Madison, Athens, Tanner, Mooresville, Belle Mina, French Mill and Capshaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
